topic.title: Appendix A Using present value techniques to measure value in use

p.i: This appendix is an integral part of the Standard. It provides guidance on the use of present value techniques in measuring value in use. Although the guidance uses the term ‘asset’, it equally applies to a group of assets forming a cash‑generating unit.
